title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 26 cm [10 1/4"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 25.5 cm [10"]  Cut both sides.
b. Warp: 25 cm [9 3/4"] Cut top and bottom.

creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. Green ground with weft strips of color for floral motif.
b. Light brown ground with weft strips of color for floral motif.
